```js Java Script in a nutshell

Functions in JavaScript

Click on "Click Here" to execute the code in the function

Click Here ```

```js
<html>
<head>
<title> Index in Arrays </title>
</head>
<body>
<script type= "text/javascript">
var animals = ["cat", "dog", "mouse"];
var x = animals[2];
document.write(x);
</script>
</body>
</html>
```

```js
<html>
<head>
<title> Index in Arrays </title>
</head>
<body>
<script type= "text/javascript">
var animals = ["cat", "dog", "mouse"];
y=animals.length
document.write(y);
</script>
</body>
</html>
```
